column1: Rhinoplasty is surgery to repair or reshape the nose.
General anesthesia allows you to sleep through the operation.
The surgery is usually done through a cut (incision) made inside the nostrils.
Rhinoplasty is one of the most common plastic surgery procedures.
Many surgeons prefer to perform cosmetic nose surgery after the nasal bone has finished growing.
This is around age 14 or 15 for girls and a bit later for boys.

Risks of anesthesia and surgery in general are: - Reactions to medications, problems breathing - Bleeding, infection, or bruising After surgery, tiny blood vessels that have burst may appear as tiny red spots on the skin surface.
